mean_cn: n.纪律；学科；训练；  v.训练
mean_en: the practice of training people to obey rules and orders and punishing them if they do not; the controlled behaviour or situation that results from this training
sentence: These soldiers are showing great discipline.
sentence_trans: 这些士兵展现出很强的纪律性。
word_etyma: dis分散 + cip拿 + line一条直线 → 使分散的成为一条直线 → discipline纪律
